TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lavulan, title = Lavulan, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lavulan} }

S.FORM: Lavulan Itiniay i Taoyuan Cen no Kaohsiung ko Lavulan a niyaro', 81 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 222 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 219 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun96 , Tayal0.5 , Rukai0.5 , Puyuma0.5 , Paiwan0.5 , roma0.5 . Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
